item.description:
Our Second Meeting! Woo Hoo!
Due to the Yarmouth Clam Festival Falling on the third weekend of the month, this months meeting will happen a week early
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the red door on the first floor in the back of the building next to the parking lot. We'll have a sign up for RAW MAINE. Come on in and I'll be smiling in front of all of our beautiful creations
item.why: Enjoy yummy raw creations, make connections with others to share excitement, passion and experiences about the raw & living foods lifestyle, get information, find support, most of all HAVE FUN hanging out because you know how awesome raw food is!

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be! Summer's Bounty
